channel.title: MacOS on Chris Titus Tech | Technology Simplified
channel.description: Recent content in MacOS on Chris Titus Tech | Technology Simplified

item.title: Zsh
item.description: In this article, I go over my implementation of ZSH, which is a better shell alternative to BASH.

item.title: Hackintosh Ryzen Install
item.description: Here is the basic install instruction for the Hackintosh Ryzen install that I used on my Ryzen 2700 with an RX 580.

item.title: Fix for Kernel Panic in Mac OSX
item.description: Follow these steps to fix a kernel panic in Mac OSX. However, if this doesn’t fix the issue, there is a good chance the motherboard is damaged and you need to send it to Apple.

item.title: Release and Renew IP in OS X
item.description: I recently had some issues where a bridged virtual machine in osx would disconnect my osx side network connection. A simple release and renew would fix this.
